Description: Indulge in the ultimate chocolate lover's dream with our Chocolate Lava Cake. Crack open the delicate shell to reveal a warm, oozing center of rich dark chocolate. Served with a scoop of vanilla bean ice cream and a sprinkle of powdered sugar, it's the perfect balance of warm, cold, and sweet, making each bite a heavenly indulgence
A nice warm apple pie with whipped cream and apricot marmalade originating out of germany.
